rows.label: tlk46400078_02_msg0001
rows.name:
I was just remembering how
kindly Fan-sama used to treat
all the refugees...

rows.label: tlk46400078_02_msg0002
rows.name:
I cannot understand how anyone could
bring themselves to take the life of such
a kind and noble soul.

rows.label: tlk46400078_02_msg0003
rows.name:
It feels as though the Acedia I know
and love is gradually slipping away...
It scares me a little.
